description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A simple and fun music based multiplayer game for family and friends. Supports 1-8 players sharing only 1 Xbox 360 Control Pad. This is a great game for Christmas!
